tasks.task: Interacting in a simulated farming environment
subtasks: Navigating virtual reality visitors
Receiving a briefing on upcoming farming tasks
Greeting and showing attention to a family member
Operating a computer to access farm management systems
Adjusting farm equipment settings for optimal performance
Monitoring water levels and scheduling irrigation
Administering first aid to an injured fish
Hand-operating a tool to remove debris from waterways
Collecting fruit and planting seeds
Setting traps for birds and rodents
Applying pesticides or other treatments to crops
Assisting in the preparation of tools and equipment
Conducting regular inspections of farm infrastructure

tasks.task: Attending a virtual farming conference or event
subtasks: Presenting a demonstration of farming techniques
Discussing market trends and price fluctuations with fellow farmers
Networking and exchanging advice with industry professionals
Innovating solutions to common farming challenges
Exploring sustainable agricultural practices
Using global positioning systems (GPS) for field mapping
Implementing drone technology for crop management
Engaging in customer service to address consumer inquiries
